mapper.select: SELECT M_ID, M_PASSWORD, M_NAME, M_GENDER, M_PHONE, M_EMAIL, M_HOST_REQUEST FROM MEMBER WHERE M_ID = #{id}

SELECT * FROM (SELECT r.RES_NO resNo, r.M_ID id, b.B_TITLE title, b.M_ID host, r.DATE date, f.B_FILENAME fileName, r.B_NO boardNo FROM ACTI_RESERVATION r JOIN ACTI_BOARD b ON r.B_NO = b.B_NO JOIN ACTI_FILE f ON r.B_NO = f.B_NO WHERE r.M_ID = #{id} GROUP BY resNo) AS UNO ORDER BY DATE DESC;

SELECT r.RES_NO resNo, r.M_ID id, b.B_TITLE title, b.M_ID host, r.DATE date, f.B_FILENAME fileName, b.B_CONTENT content, b.MAP_TEXT mapText, b.MAP_LL mapLL, b.B_NO boardNo,
COUNT(CASE WHEN r.B_NO = 1001 AND r.DATE = '2022-10-30' THEN 1 END) count FROM ACTI_RESERVATION r JOIN ACTI_BOARD b ON r.B_NO = b.B_NO JOIN ACTI_DATE d ON r.B_NO = d.B_NO JOIN ACTI_FILE f ON r.B_NO = f.B_NO WHERE r.RES_NO= #{resNo}
SELECT r.RES_NO resNo, f.B_FILENAME fileName, r.B_NO boardNo FROM ACTI_RESERVATION r JOIN ACTI_FILE f ON r.B_NO = f.B_NO WHERE r.RES_NO= #{resNo}

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT RES_NO) FROM ACTI_RESERVATION r JOIN ACTI_BOARD b ON r.B_NO = b.B_NO JOIN ACTI_DATE d ON r.B_NO = d.B_NO JOIN ACTI_FILE f ON r.B_NO = f.B_NO WHERE r.B_NO = #{boardNo} AND r.DATE = #{date}

SELECT CHAT_ID chatId, M_ID writer, CHAT_DATE date, CHAT_CONTENTS content, CHAT_ROOM chatRoom FROM M_CHAT WHERE CHAT_ROOM = #{chatRoom} UNION ALL SELECT CHAT_ID chatId, M_ID writer, CHAT_DATE date, CHAT_CONTENTS content, CHAT_ROOM chatRoom FROM H_CHAT WHERE CHAT_ROOM = #{chatRoom} ORDER BY date
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO M_CHAT (M_ID, CHAT_ROOM, CHAT_CONTENTS) VALUES (#{id}, #{chatRoom}, #{content})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT * FROM (SELECT r.RES_NO resNo, r.M_ID id, b.M_ID host, f.B_FILENAME fileName, m.CHAT_CONTENTS content, m.CHAT_DATE date, b.B_NO boardNo FROM ACTI_RESERVATION r JOIN ACTI_BOARD b ON r.B_NO = b.B_NO JOIN ACTI_FILE f ON f.B_NO = b.B_NO JOIN M_CHAT m ON m.CHAT_ROOM = r.RES_NO ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 18446744073709551615) AS one WHERE id = #{id} GROUP BY resNo) AS two ORDER BY date DESC
SELECT M_ID id, M_PASSWORD password, M_NAME name, M_GENDER gender, M_PHONE phone, M_EMAIL email, M_HOST_REQUEST host FROM MEMBER WHERE M_EMAIL = #{email}
